moves.1. d4 d5 2. Bg5: Hmmm... I haven't seen anyone play this before, so I played normally.
moves.6. Nf3 Be7 7. Ne5: Weird... does not really do anything.
moves.7... Nbd7 8. Nxf7: Not a good move, my king is perfectly protected on f7 because of my bishop and knight.
moves.10. a3 c5 11. Bd3 Bxd3 12. Qxd3 c4: Now I got a good chain.
moves.13. Qe2 Qa5: A trick if he castles to the queen side.
moves.14. O-O-O: I guess he did not see the move, here it is.
moves.14... Bxa3: I win a pawn with a mate attack.
moves.17. Kb1: A huge blunder! c3 and it's over.
moves.17... Qb4+: I missed the c3 move too, how sad.
moves.18. Kc1 Qa3+: Though I did see it now.
moves.19... c3: And he resinged with no defence for the upcoming mate next move. Thank you for watching!
